projects.description: Final production name for 'River-9', also known as 'Tartarus-v3' project owned by the user. Marketing name is now 'River-9'.

User's project for migrating approximately 47% of existing workloads to a new hybrid cloud platform by end of Q1 2026, including legacy billing engines, customer support ticketing archive, and Phoenix/Aether systems renamed to Tartarus-v3.
Phase-2 encryption system processing approximately 4,850,000 client records daily at peak steady-state.
